title: Lil Nas X ft. Jack Harlow Perform "Industry Baby" & "Montero" | 2021 VMAs | MTV
author: MTV
description:
Lil Nas X ft. Jack Harlow perform "Industry Baby" and "Montero" at the 2021 VMAs. 

Check out more from the 2021 VMAs here: http://www.mtv.com/vma

#VMAs #MTV #LilNasX
